entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse wish you were serious about acting on Dr Fauci's advice

rather that throwing together a photo op

that will change nothing in your - Mr Pence - or Trump's - actual approach to COVID19:

Do nothing productive, lie, obfuscate, divert blame

UB Traitor to US public health, Mr Pence
